-- 查询当前用户发布的图片详情
SELECT i.id as mid, i.imgs_url, i.content, i.agree_count, i.comment_count, air.aid as album_id, a.name as album_name, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(i.update_date)*1000 AS time, u.id AS user_id, u.username AS username, u.avatar AS avatar, if(ag.uid != '' ,1,0)as is_agree FROM t_img_details AS i LEFT JOIN t_user AS u ON i.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_album_img_relation as air on i.id = air.mid left join t_album as a on a.id = air.aid left join t_agree as ag on ag.agree_id = i.id and ag.type =1 and ag.uid = #{uid} WHERE (i.user_id in (SELECT fid from t_follow where uid = #{uid} ) or i.user_id = #{uid} ) and a.uid = i.user_id ORDER BY i.update_date DESC LIMIT ${(page-1)*limit},${limit};
